title: Welcome to the Sound & Music board!
body:
Hey gang!

Welcome to the League of Legends Sound & Music board! This is the place to discuss all things audio in Runeterra. 

Music, voice-over, and sound FX are all fair game here, and we want to hear your thoughts.

Not only do we want this space to serve as a hub for great feedback, we'd love to grow this into a fun place for all of us to share in the discussion of audio in all of its forms.

Welcome!

replies.body:
Hey Riot,

I realy appreciated for your hard work, I like the sion new VO a lot. However, your recent work on champions, including new champs and VU, had made the champions talk a lot. I am very happy with vary of quotes and interactions (thanks again), but having my champ talking every 3 or 4 second once annoyed me. I cannot focus into the fight.

I am sorry if I didn't post this in the right box, but yeah... please consider.

And again, thank you for always bringing me a great game <3

I started in TT years ago and loved the music when you included it in Doom bots brought back so much memories mandropping to the enemy base! 
anyway we can swap music from the other maps?
AWESOME! Thanks for adding this in

I would really enjoy a more dynamic soundtrack to the game - something that seems cinematic and epic (lord of the rings style battles), but doesn't distract from the game. Are there any plans on revamping the in-game music?

I absolutely agree with Infinthesis

Lots of games have iconic soundtracks, like age of empires, skyrim, ...
It would be really nice to have one for LoL! 

The music that plays in champ select feels a bit outdated and repetitive to me, altough that would be a great place to put some nice music.
With the login screen music you're already doing a great job, maybe that can serve as a direction/motivation for the rest of the sounds.

Looking forward to it :D
